affiliations: Prior to collecting data, we took ethical clearance from the Ethical Committee, Institute of Biological Sciences (IBSc), Rajshahi University, Bangladesh to study on communicable diseases
author: Md. Golam Hossain; Md. kamrul Islam; Md. Abdur Rafi; Md. Abdul Wadood; Lai Lee Lee; Suhaili Mohd; ASMA Mamun
title: Knowledge, attitude, practice and perception regarding COVID-19 among students in Bangladesh: Survey in Rajshahi University

funding.funding-statement: The authors have no support or funding to report.
